verbs.description: south africa [ARGM-DIS: julius] [ARGM-DIS: malema] [V: confirms] [ARG1: white farmer land grab tells trump to say out of it] radical south african politician julius malema has called out president donald trump and defiantly confirmed the country expropriation without compensation plan to take land from white farmers what is the plan through land expropriation we are forcing white people to share the land which was gained through a crime against the humanity of black and african people malema said in a press conference on thursday he was referring to racist colonialism and apartheid practices south africa is a post - colonial country ceased with deep racial inequalities that were long designed by apartheid and colonization malema leader of the economic freedom fighters opposition party said our land expropriation program seeks to realize the ideal of equality and human dignity trump tweeted wednesday that he directed secretary of state mike pompeo to closely study the south africa land and farm seizures and expropriations and the large scale killing of farmers https twitter com realdonaldtrump status 1032454567152246785 that prompted an angry response from malema we must … economic freedom fighters african national congress trump south africa julius malema african government donald trump donald the mike pompeo
